title: OPERATION UTOPIA, WAR BREAKS OUT | ONE PIECE Episode 107 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A couples reaction and discussion video for One Piece Episode 107, focusing on Operation Utopia's commencement and the outbreak of war in Arabasta.

title: 107: Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr Blogger)
description: A first-time viewer's reaction and thoughts on Episode 107, expressing frustration that Crocodile explained parts of Operation Utopia's execution while wanting to know more about his motivations.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: First-time viewing blog with no future spoilers

title: One Piece: The Arabasta Arc, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: A comprehensive explanation of the Arabasta Arc including details about Operation Utopia and Crocodile's plan to acquire Pluton. The article covers the full arc from the Straw Hats' arrival to the climactic battles.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Arabasta Arc

title: One Piece: Alabasta (62-135) Episode 107 - Operation Utopia Commences! The Swell of Rebellion Stirs!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of One Piece Episode 107 on Crunchyroll. The episode depicts Crocodile executing Operation Utopia as Mr. 2 impersonates King Cobra and the rebellion begins its march on Alubarna.
